attributes.action: double any penalty for a motorist committing any traffic offence with children in their vehicle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motorist who break speed limits, use mobile phones, drive without seat belts on themsleves or their passengers, disobey other traffic orders or commit any offence with children in their vehicle are not only endangering those children and other people, but also setting a poor example to future generations about respect for rules and laws.
